title: Good things come in small packages

abstract: 'Everyone has a special friend, well my special friend is Sam.'
description: When Sam came up to Leeanne Hill and asked her for a hug, a friendship started that has only become stronger over the years. These best friends are there for each other through everything, including Hill's struggle with Turner's Syndrome.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002121; Hidden treasure : thoughts about living with Turner's Syndrome : Digital Storytelling project; Active; 2006
